message: I propose dividing the money with a 3:1 ratio, giving you 250000 dollars. I believe this is fair considering the risk and value of the remaining rounds.
I'll give you a small share, but I'm willing to take most of the risk and potential reward.
Considering the inflation and risk, I propose a 3:2 ratio. This ensures a more balanced distribution while accounting for the diminishing value of the money in subsequent rounds.
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm still willing to take on most of the risk and potential reward, considering the inflation and diminishing value of the money.
